playin would you rather
when it comes to fire
you always say that youd prefer to drown
you were still in the ambulance
when the cop suggested youre the one
who tried to burn it down

chorus phoebe bridgers conor oberst both
come to find out

verse 2 phoebe bridgers
we have the same face
i laid awake as someone shoved you up against a wall
quarantined in a bad dream
hes half the man and youre twice as tall

chorus phoebe bridgers conor oberst both
come to find out
im a can on a string youre on the end
we found our way out
of the suicide pact of our family and friends
in the background ill be waiting
you might also likebridge phoebe bridgers  conor oberst
next time i see you youll show me
a hundred different ways to say the same things

chorus phoebe bridgers conor oberst both
come to find out
im a can on a string youre on the end
we found our way out

and when you touch down ill be waving12embed
